reviewText: Daughter wanted movie because an actor was in it.  The loved the movie!!

Amazon is advertising the US NTSC format version of working, but sent me (and at least one other person it seems, from reading these reviews) the PAL format DVD. Unplayable and useless in any Region 1 players. I am now waiting for a US replacement. I'll update when I get it and hope this time it's the right one.
this dvd will not play in a dvd player.  I tried it in 3 different players. It will only play on a computer. Sorry I bought it.

I haven't actually viewed this DVD yet, but I appeared in two productions of this show myself, and I'm sure I'm going to enjoy it.  From all appearances, the product is in fine shape, and it seems like a good cast.
One of the best plays that I have ever seen. Saw it with this cast on broadway and two more times by a local company.  It is wonderful.

This musical was shown on PBS many years ago.  It is still relevant in its reflection on work.  The pace is fast, and the music is delightful.  It is a celebration of work and also makes a bow to its challenges and difficulties.  Best of all, it moves one beyond just doing a job and made me think about "the daily grind" as somewhat hopeful and redemptive.
The video is old and obscure - not the original Broadway cast, but an excellent one, just the same. A PBS TV version of the musical.
